Question description: First, you will be given a list of three 'nonsense' words and their English word meanings. The question(s) that follow will ask you to reverse the process and translate an English word into the artificial language.

1.Question:
Here are some words translated from an artificial language.
gemolinea means fair warning
gerimitu means report card
gilageri means weather report
Which word could mean "fair weather"?
